name: Seacurity Breach
description: Blissful life in Solarimere archipelago is in danger. Barbaric Aquator tribe is invading peaceful Aerian lands! Join officers of Queen Albina in their struggle to repel Aquator invasion.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
